description: Charley Chase is super sexy and amazing in this action packed fantasy role play update! New to modeling, she does a shoot thinking it will be tame damsel in distress style bondage. However, everything changes when the director, Mark Davis, makes an announcement to his film crew declaring it a crew appreciation day. Tied up and helpless, Charley Chase is stripped down, fondled, dominated, and fucked for their enjoyment!
title: Crew Appreciation
